body.name: Greenstell TV Wall Mount with LED Lights, Full Motion TV Mount for 26-65 inch TVs, DIY TV Backlights with Music Sync, Swivel, Tilt, Single Articulating Arm, Max VESA 400x400mm, Holds up to 88lbs
features: Adjustable LED System: The LED Lights can be controlled via the included remote or app. Over 60,000 DIY color options to set the mood for any movie or music genre. Easily select colors, change modes, adjust brightness, smart timing, bringing you an extremely dynamic and immersive TV viewing /gaming experience

Wide Compatibility: The Greenstell TV Wall Mount fits 26-60 inch flat/curved TVs and holds up to 88lbs of weight. With VESA pattern from 75x75mm to 400x400mm. Our stand is compatible with TV brands such as Samsung, Sony, Sharp, TCL, LG, Vizio, etc. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase

Full Motion for Optimal Viewing: Tilting your TV screen up 5°and down 15°to reduce glare, swivel tv ±90°, level adjusts ±3° for maximum viewing flexibility. Retract 3.4” for space saving, extend 20.8” from wall for optimal positioning. The Greenstell TV Wall Mount can help you feel comfortable during tv time at family gatherings

Space-Saving Corner Design: Tailored for corner and flat spaces, our wall mount ingeniously maximizes your room layout. Say goodbye to awkwardly placed TVs and welcome a sleek, corner-fitted solution, you can Install this TV mount in the bedroom, home gym, kitchen, and more

Easy Installation & Robust Structure: Our TV bracket includes clear instructions, labeled hardware, a bubble level, and installation positioning paper for a swift installation on 16" or 24" wood studs or concrete/brick walls (not suitable for drywall alone). The robust structure, confirmed through weight-bearing tests, guarantees a secure mounting experience for your TV.

Create the Ultimate Watching Experience What are the features of our LED lights? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased several TV mounts over the years and most of them from a box store. This one beats every single one of the others that I have ever purchased. The build quality is really good and the mount is really sturdy.It is fairly easy to install. I elected to use some shorter lag screws that I already had as the supplied ones are really long. The provided template was a huge time saver and it is made of a good material that is easy to align and press flat against the wall. I installed mine on a stud through our wood paneling and sheetrock.The kit comes with a few Velcro cable management straps and the mount itself has two cord hooks/loops to run your cables up and behind the TV. Alignment was pretty easy to do. I squared up the mount prior to installing it and the final alignment was just a slight tweaking. The provided level works well and is properly calibrated.The LED lights are really neat and they have a lot of settings for different effects. You can set them up to change with music, solid colors, flashing, running colors... etc. A power supply is included for the LED lights if your TV doesn't have a powered USB port.I used this mount to setup a PC based work/game center for my kids. It is setup in the living room so we can watch what they are doing. The mini PC we used is also mounted on the TV mount on the backside. This TV mount has no problem holding the 40" Vizio Smart TV and the mini PC. The swinging/rotating action of this mount is nice and smooth. I suspect it can hold quite a bit of weight, so this would be good for the larger TVs as well.Excellent quality, excellent buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to install and so many angles to use.
reviews.reviewText: This thing was so easy to install i was surprised. I just marked the middle of the stud, measured the top hole up from it, and it was done. It has many height adjustments to even if you didn't get it at exactly the right height chances are the mounting arms will allow you to fix that. And with the 3 bar swing arm I can have it (almost) flat against the wall, pull it out very much closer to me if gaming and want to see better, or angle it to any specific seat if I am the only one watching. This mount is a super value and it holds my 65" tv like its nothing. I do not worry, this thing isn't gonna go anywhere. It is super strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mount was perfect for my daughter's tv. It's very sturdy and the lights are actually quite cool. It was really easy to install with the wall template. Literally no problems at all
